mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(-1) FROM member WHERE password=#{password} AND email=#{email}
select email, nickname, username, password, address, member_picture_url from member where email= #{email} AND password= #{password}
select email, nickname, username, password, address, member_picture_url from member where email=#{value}
